website_summaries.verdict: The Taos Guest Star offers excellent value for money as it brings total comfort that one can look for. This footwear is equipped with an insole built to provide arch and metatarsal support that people with diabetes, arthritis, and other foot issues can benefit from. The right balance of comfort and style is what the Guest Star hopes to deliver from the get-go.
pros: The Taos Guest Star sneaker offers excellent arch support that has been lauded by a lot of wearers
Many users have attested that it is among the Taos shoes that deliver comfort
This footwear has a stylish design that several customers have appreciated
A few have noted that they love the quality of the Taos Guest Star
Some wearers say that they receive compliments whenever they wear this sneaker
It has a versatile design that excellently matches jeans and other casual outfits, according to a few reviewers
Most of the respondents say that they would recommend the low-top Guest Star from Taos to their friends
cons: Several users have noted that the Taos Guest Star fits a bit tight or narrow
Sizing at least ½ up is suggested

customer_reviews.title: Good for Plantar Fasciitis sufferers!
customer_reviews.text: I have been suffering from plantar fasciitis for several years now. I was skeptical but gave these a shot. I'm glad I did. I walked around Las Vegas for 2 days with no pain. They are expensive but for me, they were worth it. My only small complaint is that the base of all of these shoes is beige and I wish some of them were white to look like Keds or other canvas type shoe.
customer_reviews.author: GadgetPrincess

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality Shoe - Runs narrow
customer_reviews.text: This was a nice quality shoe. Had great built in support. After reading the reviews, I ordered a 1/2 size larger than I normally wear. When received, the length of the shoe was fine, given that I had ordered a 1/2 size larger. But, the width of the shoe was somewhat tight to be considered a medium width. I can normally wear a medium with with no problem, but the width of this shoe was too tight for comfort for me. I would have definitely re-ordered this shoe had it been available in a wide width. But, to my disappointment, a wide width was not available.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara T.

customer_reviews.title: Great arch support
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this show because I needed a sneaker w/ good arch support for my plantar. It does run small so I ordered a 9 as always sneakers run small I've been told, I usually wear an 8 1/2 in shoes. They are comfortable I wore them for several hours. I have a narrow foot, and they are fitted to my foot, so if you have a wide foot order accordingly. My feet were happy that I was not in a flat sneaker, and I didn't have to put in my plantar insoles. They ROCK!
customer_reviews.author: N Villegas

customer_reviews.title: Like Keds, but with actual support
customer_reviews.text: These are the cutest shoes. Like Keds, but with actual support, however, they are really small! I even ordered up from a size 6 to 6.5 and they still pinch. I might need a wide width in this shoe, but don't think it was offered.
customer_reviews.author: lorik4

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoe but doesn't fit comfortably
customer_reviews.text: Really liked these shoes but unfortunately I had to return them. I take a 37 in Tao sandals (61/2 to 7) but I ordered this shoe in the 8 as suggested. When I tried them on, the arch did not fit my foot properly and was uncomfortable. Also, the back of the shoe kept slipping. What was odd was that I put the sole of the shoe up to the sole of my Tao sandal and it was the same length. I don't know why they didn't fit well. It just isn't up to the same standard at the sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Markie

customer_reviews.title: Runs small, but incredibly comfortable and cute.
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoes, this is my third pair! They have really great support. I walk around campus a lot and these shoes have been fabulous. I like them better than similar styles from Vans or Converse, because they make my feet look petite rather than awkwardly long. Order a half a size up.
customer_reviews.author: StacysMom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, attractive, shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe with fantastic support. These look like run of the mill keds or white plimsolls, but what sets them apart is the incredible arch support and comfort they provide. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Beeker

customer_reviews.title: Cute sneakers for casual wear
customer_reviews.text: Taos sneakers are my favorites and these cuties didn't disappoint. I have narrow heels so I added a heel liner and the fit is perfect. Excellent arch support and very comfortable. This is my 8th pair of Taos Stars -- they're my go-to's. I wear a pair just about every day. The paisley pattern is pretty and adds some zip to casual outfits. They also look great with jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Susan from Tampa Bay

customer_reviews.title: runs small
customer_reviews.text: i normally wear 8.5-9. Nine was very tight. 9.5 fit perfectly. Apart from the sizing issues, the shoes are very cute and comfortable. If you're looking for a simple sneaker, this is a MUCH better option than keds or converse. Great arch support and the heel is nicely padded, but i do wish the ball of the foot had more padding. Still, very comfortable and definitely keeping.
customer_reviews.author: L. Dunlop

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes very comfortable I do like to wear my shoes without socks so I got a 9.5 and wish I had a 10 I usually get a 9 so I went up a 1/2 a size but should have gone up an entire size but still like the shoes
customer_reviews.author: Christie Rose

customer_reviews.title: High arch? These shoes are made for you!
customer_reviews.text: With a narrow heel and high arch, I find it difficult to find shoes that support my feet throughout the day as an elementary school teacher. After suffering through plantar fasciitis and a back injury, I started searching for more supportive shoes. I bought my first pair of Taos over two years ago and now own 10 pair! I wear Taos almost daily now to work.
customer_reviews.author: Delana C

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoe but try on first so you know what size fits.
customer_reviews.text: Love that there is support which you normally don’t find in a canvas shoe. Very comfortable. I luckily had tried on this shoe at a local store so I knew what size to get. I would say it runs 1/2 to a full size small.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not my first pair of Taos
customer_reviews.text: I love Taos shoes and the support their footbed provides. I have found they tend to run small. I typically wear a 6-1:2, but the 7 fits much better. They are rather stiff, but I expect them to soften and loosen up with time.
customer_reviews.author: Ricki

customer_reviews.title: Great supportive pair of sneakers!
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers go with everything, have great arch support and comfortable enough to wear all day! As suggested, I sized up 1/2 a size. I'm glad I did because they did run a 1/2 size small. Will be purchasing other colors!!!
customer_reviews.author: L_M_B

customer_reviews.title: Not like my other Taos sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I love my Taos sneakers but don't like this style at all. It doesn't allow room for my hammer toe and bunion and it hits my ankle wrong. I'll stick to the style that fits well. They are a really cute pattern
customer_reviews.author: kathyk

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are cute but not true to size, I recommend you go a size up I wear a 8 1/2 or a 9 I got a size 9 in them I'm glad I did or I wouldn't be able to wear them I will recommend that you get them and I will get them again but I will be going a size up, I will be getting a 91/2 .
customer_reviews.author: It's me !

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and feminine
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a sneaker that wasn't too chunky or sporty, but with a little arch support. I always order 1/2 size bigger in Taos footwear. My feet are slightly wide, but wide shoes are too loose. These have more room in the toe box than the Keds shoe that looks similar. They are constructed very well, look super cute and feminine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you have fat feet don’t buy these
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. I love the color and the corduroy but it is a tight fit at first and takes some stretching with wear. If you have fat feet don’t buy these. I have chubby feet and it needs some stretching still.
customer_reviews.author: BrittanieS

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are perfect for someone who is on their feet all day. There is a great arch support which works perfect with my plantars fasciitis. I read the reviews before I ordered them and it was recommended to order 1/2 size up so I did; however, they are a little big. I should have ordered my normal size which is an 8 1/2
customer_reviews.author: Trina Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Cute, great support for plantar fasciitis!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! With plantar fasciitis, it’s hard to find comfortable shoes to wear all day. These look cute and my feet felt great after wearing them all day
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Stiff
customer_reviews.text: Well since the was by Taos I thought it might be easier on the foot. But this style is no better than the old style stiff US Keds. I will not wear them and need to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Jane in OK

customer_reviews.title: Love the fit and feel
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find these in my size in the store, so was thrilled to find them available on Amazon. Metatarsal support is awesome and I've worn these all day when traveling. Hold up well and don't show signs of scuffs.
customer_reviews.author: BarbC

customer_reviews.title: Great support but run small
customer_reviews.text: A lot of the reviews suggested ordering a half or full size up. I ordered my usual size and they were too small. Returned for a half size larger and now they fit nicely. Their sandals I bought this summer were true to size so I don’t know why that is not true about the sneakers. Recently developed some issues with pain in my feet and these shoes offer great support.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Eden

customer_reviews.title: Adorable gym shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute shoes. They are just a little tight in the width in the front . Not good if you have bunion issues or a wide foot.
customer_reviews.author: J Sirb

customer_reviews.title: Look good and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Nice and comfortable but at least a whole size too small. Very narrow too. I had to return them. Great customer service
customer_reviews.author: M Chin

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I've worn Taos sandals for years, but had never worn the sneakers. They are very comfortable. I do have a narrow heel, so it was a little loose on the heel, but nothing that would keep me from buying another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Mellanie

customer_reviews.title: Cute.....but...Go bigger....
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a 7.5 so I ordered an 8...still too small....way too small...probably would have needed a 9.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rigid
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is not flexible for walking. Very stiff . It does have a built in instep but it is very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: tklense

customer_reviews.title: Not for fat feet
customer_reviews.text: My feet are wide. Too snug and not flattering on my foot. I love Taos shoes, though, and own several styles.
customer_reviews.author: cindi

customer_reviews.title: So cute and comfy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the comfort of Taos!!! The innersoles are the best....cushy and great arches!! These look great with any shade of green and with burgundy. Love them!! True to size!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Heavy shoe
customer_reviews.text: Because of the non support I returned this shoe. Very cute but rather heavy. Did not like the fit.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Dowdy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Color
customer_reviews.text: I love the bronze color of this tennis shoe. It's different & goes with everything. You just need to remember with this shoe, it runs small (as others have stated) so order a 1/2 size larger
customer_reviews.author: jchip

customer_reviews.title: A little small
customer_reviews.text: Had to return product because size was a little small. Got my usual size because going up in size would have made it too big.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Not for narrow heels
customer_reviews.text: I am a solid 8.5, but could only buy a 9 in the black. Loved the way the shoe fit in the arch and toe, but I have very narrow heels. Shoe slipped badly on the heel where my whole heel was nearly coming out with each step. Wish they sold them in half sizes. Ended up returning after test driving them in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra Smith

customer_reviews.title: Purchased on Recommendation
customer_reviews.text: A friend told me she loved Taos sneakers because they offered comfortable support. These certainly do.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Runs narrow
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe but runs narrow. I was unable to wear because it was to small.
customer_reviews.author: nightshift girl

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and flashy!
customer_reviews.text: Taos shoes are the best. Good support, many styles to choose from. Love t
customer_reviews.author: brenda spence

customer_reviews.title: Sizing problem.
customer_reviews.text: I have a narrow foot and my usual problems with sneakers are that they are often too wide. This sneaker was tight from sole to top and width-wise. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn W

customer_reviews.title: Not leather!
customer_reviews.text: Love Taos.... BUT this one not so much. It is narrow and I needed the size up. The heel was too big for me so it slipped and also felt like my the bottom of heel was way lower than the front ball of foot! Not a good fit for me. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. D

customer_reviews.title: I’m in love!
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love! I bought two more pairs of taos shoes after this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Jamie

customer_reviews.title: These were adorable shoes. I wear an eleven and even though ...
customer_reviews.text: These were adorable shoes. I wear an eleven and even though reviews said to go up in size, I couldn’t bring myself to buy a twelve and 11.5 wasn’t offered. Had to return them
customer_reviews.author: frequent shopper

customer_reviews.title: Too small.
customer_reviews.text: Toe box too small. Hurt. Even a size up was still too small.
customer_reviews.author: KTJO

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great! Just like others said, order a half size up. They are a little bit wide but they are very comfortable and it feels good to be able to look cute while taking care of my feet! They’ve got great support!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Insole too hard.
customer_reviews.text: I had to return these shoes. The insole was too hard for me. Also, too wide in heel. I wear a narrow, but tried these just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Finally!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried may brands of tennis shoes and this is finally one that definitely supports my arches perfectly and I was thrilled to find my favorite style. I'm not into big, bulky shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Theisman

customer_reviews.title: the shoes hurt my feet after a bit of wearing
customer_reviews.text: not sure why these aren't comfortable - but after a bit of wear they seem to hurt my feet. i am not familiar with the brand.
customer_reviews.author: A-Muse'd

customer_reviews.title: Old lady shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great fit but not very fashionable. Maw maw looking!!!
customer_reviews.author: Judy Carman

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love the color on the outside and the insole on the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Ting

customer_reviews.title: Color wasn't what I expected...
customer_reviews.text: Cute, seemed comfortable... but I am returning them. They are cream and black not white and black.
customer_reviews.author: Karyn

customer_reviews.title: I love these
customer_reviews.text: I read so many reviews before I bought these. I have planta fasciitis, high arches and a high instep, plus my foot is wide and square. These are amazing. The arch is fantastic. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Burchfield

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for walking
customer_reviews.text: have worn out my last pair so I needed to replace. Its a must have when sightseeing.
customer_reviews.author: GREG ELDER

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!! Decent support!
customer_reviews.text: I have had foot pain most my life. I was looking for a casual shoe with good support. This was my second purchase of Taos this month, I LOVE these shoes!!! This pattern is super cute!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wider then typical Taos
customer_reviews.text: Very wide, not at all like the classic STAR by Taos
customer_reviews.author: ChooseKind67

customer_reviews.title: Runs very large
customer_reviews.text: Much larger than anticipated for my size. Had to return but I love Taos shoes over all.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl T

customer_reviews.title: Cute, nice arch support
customer_reviews.text: Nice cute sneaker with good arch support. Followed others advice to size up and glad I did, buy a 1/2 size up.
customer_reviews.author: Kim in NC

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are working out
customer_reviews.text: Like these pretty well. They do have arch support which I need. My only complaint is they pick up lint on the black.
customer_reviews.author: crittenberry

customer_reviews.title: Na
customer_reviews.text: This brand of shoe has been a lifesaver for me.
customer_reviews.author: carmen  verdugo

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable! Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Love the sporty look and they provide terrific arch support!
customer_reviews.author: desiree

customer_reviews.title: Taos Womens Guest Star tennis shoes
customer_reviews.text: I like the style and the arch support. Very attractive tennis shoe
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: This is the best! My 5th pair of Taos brand sneakers!
customer_reviews.author: debbie

customer_reviews.title: These shoes feel great! I have had some feet pain with most ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes feel great! I have had some feet pain with most shoes lately. I wore these to work and had no pain all day or after I took them off. They have great support!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t order larger size
customer_reviews.text: Had to return them. It said to order a 1/2 size up I did and the shoe slid off my heel. Bought heel liners to try and tighten it up but that didn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Suitable
customer_reviews.text: It’s suitable for my feet and it’s light to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: My size is 9 and I ordered 9, but was little bit loose Not very comfy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arch support
customer_reviews.text: Love Tao’s cute but comfortable Good arch support. Run a little small order 1/2 bigger
customer_reviews.author: Christine Pesotine

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! Great for someone who is on their feet all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good support
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes although tight in toes. I wear these regularly
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! However, I had to size up when I got them. I wear between a 6.5-7 and I had to purchase a 7.5. So size up. But the shoes are so comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Way too small
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews I sized up 1/2 size but still too short.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Boring

product_meta.title: Taos Footwear Women's Guest Star Fashion Sneaker
product_meta.description: The Guest Star is a great compliment to your wardrobe. This corduroy lace up delivers a comfortable fit with a fresh look. Amazing comfort comes from the Curves & Pods premium removable footbed, one of the most comfortable footbeds that might ever touch your feet.
feature_bullets: *Fit Tip: Customer feedback suggests to order a half size larger*
